transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Customer: Madam baat kar liya karo. Phone aap phone laga ke chhod dete ho.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Aap phone laga ke chhod dete ho aise hi?
Executive: Nahi nahi chhod nahi deti hu aawaz nahi aati sir. Maine kal aapki baat suni thi IndiaMART se kal aap se baat hui thi na meri?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur sir jaise ki main dekh rahi hu ye complaint aapka ek 2.5 lakh wala to isme kya issue aaya hai?
Customer: Kya cheez kya kar rahe ho?
Executive: Jaise ki main check kar rahi hu aapke business page ki 2.5 lakh wala dispute amount ka complaint raise hua hai. Conflict wala. Bhai Vrinda Enterprises.
Customer: Ji? Aapne koi product deliver nahi kiya hai?
Customer: Nahi madam aisa to kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi yaha pe to sir show kar raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch bhi nahi hai aisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Galat hai. Check kariye aapke complaint raise hua hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi. Nahi nahi nahi inhone humse business kiya tha inhone kuch product hume sell kiya tha.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hai na kareeb kareeb mere khayal se 18-20 hazaar rupaye ka. Inhone GST pay nahi kiya tha to humne GST rok ke GST apne end pe bhar diya tha.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hai na? To ye GST ka dispute tha GST inhone nahi bhara to humne GST bhar diya. To inka kehna hai ki hume paise aur do. Humne kaha is baat ke liye aapne GST madam nahi bhara to humne khud usko bhar diya. Bhai hum double GST denge nahi madam 18% GST hai maan lijiye.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Matlab ye scenario inhone aap se koi product purchase kiya tha uske baad ye 2.5 lakh ka dispute amount dala hai?
Customer: Inhone hume sell kiya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai. Sell pe inhone humse GST claim kiya.
Executive: Theek hai. GST inhone filing nahi kari GST inhone bhara nahi portal pe. Theek hai?
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: To wo humne wo jo 2.5 lakh ka amount hai humne pay kiya GST portal pe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Matlab GST mein kya hai madam buyer ya seller mein se dono mein se koi bhi GST bhar sakta hai. Inhone jab teen mahine nahi bhara aur humne kaha bhar do to inhone kaha mere paas paise nahi. Inhone kaha paise nahi mere paas to humne kaha theek hai hum bhar dete hai koi baat nahi hai aap tension mat lo hum bharte hai.
Executive: Hai na ye hua iske sath mein theek hai madam. To inhone dispute kyu dala hai aapne inse baat nahi ki hai?
Customer: Baat kar li inhone madam inka to kehna hai ki 2.5 lakh mujhe aur do tabhi main GST jama karu. Humne kaha aise nahi hoga humne jama kar diya aap kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Nahi sir agar aapne 2.5 lakh already jama kar diya to fir inko kyu dena hai abhi?
Customer: Wahi madam ab main dekho ab kisi ko aap kya bol sakte ho ab koi agar aapko blackmail karna chah raha hai kya karoge aap batao.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab karoge aap batao. Uska us kar sakte ho aap? Bhai pehle aapne teen mahine jama nahi kiya baad me jab aapne nahi jama kiya to maine jama kar diya ek 86 ka tha plus penalty lag gayi hamare upar to 2 lakh ke kareeb 36-38 hazaar jama kiye humne mota mota.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Hmm ye hai madam dispute. Iske regarding aapne complaint dala hua hai aapke paas iska koi serious matlab koi email wagera ya koi PDF mein kuch hai iska? Jo aapne bataya hai.
Customer: Wo to account mein jama karte hai na madam account mein jama karte hai hai mere paas screenshot hai mere paas de dunga aapko.
Executive: Aap mujhe is number pe share kar dijiyega.
Customer: Haan main jo mera jo mera conversation hua tha main aapko share karunga.
Executive: Haan ji uske usko aap haan bataiye. Bataiye bataiye. Iske haan usko daal ke fir isko raise kar dena hata dena fir hai na usi behalf pe. Iske iske regarding na hamari team aapko coordinate bhi karegi. To jo sari cheeze aapki hai na aapki side se kya baat hui hai inhone kya bola hai ya fir aapki side se kya hai aapne sahi se explain kar dijiyega acche se. Bilkul bilkul. Theek hai aur jo bhi proof wagera hoga wo bhi mujhe share kar dijiyega and secondly aap na ye matlab thoda is cheez ka next time se dhyan rakhiye koi conflict na ho kyuki agar bar koi complaint hoti hai na bar bar to jo services hai wo na stop ho jati hai.
Customer: Hmm ab dekho madam jo itne time hum log ko ho gaya. Koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai. Agar aap nahi jama karoge to hum to jama karenge bhai hum to company nahi band karenge na apni. Right right. Aapke chakkar mein aapki company to band nahi karunga. Haan ye aap GST issue likh do iske andar GST dispute likh do iske andar aap. Theek hai main isme GST ka dispute hai. Share kijiyega aur jab aapko team ki side se call aayega unko sari cheez bata dijiyega unko bhi proof share kar dijiyega aur next time thoda sa aware rahiyega ki ye issue na ho kyuki agar bar bar ye complaint file hoti hai na to aapki jo services hai aapke IndiaMART ke liye sakte hoti hai wo stop ho jati hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi madam theek hai.
Executive: Aur ye amount iske against line pe raise hui hai. Ye confirmation aur chahiye tha.
Executive: Jo aap keh rahe hai aapne payment kiya payment ka screenshot hai ya fir screenshot kis cheez ka hai?
Customer: Nahi madam wo to humne GST payment kari hai na GST aur inhone jo humne payment di uski wo uska proof hai mere paas sara inhone payment kari. Inhone GST payment nahi kara humne isko inko intimet kara bar bar.
Executive: Wo share aap kar dijiyega. Haan main kar dunga main kar dunga main karwa dunga. kar lega theek hai. Haan koi bhi issue aata hai to is number pe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul madam. Okay. Isliye ye GST issue hai madam aap likh dijiyega GST issue hai ye. Theek hai main update kar dungi. Regarding regarding regarding GST hai na. Theek hai main update kar dungi don't worry. Theek hai okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a complaint for ₹2.5L dispute.

- Customer wants to remove the complaint.

- Customer says the other party is blackmailing him.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the complaint details.

- Executive asked for payment proofs.

- Executive assured coordination from their team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share payment proofs.

- IndiaMART team will coordinate with the customer.



Alert (If Any):

blackmail

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, gst, payment, dispute, services
